xfy.fakeview.library.fview

接口 IFViewRoot

  • 所有超级接口:
    FViewParent
    所有已知实现类:
    FViewRootImpl

    public interface IFViewRoot
extends FViewParent
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/7.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      FView findFViewById(int id)
      Finds the first descendant view with the given ID, the view itself if the ID matches IView.getId(), or null if the ID is invalid (< 0) or there is no matching view in the hierarchy.
      FView getTargetChild()
      Get root child
      void invalidate()
      Invalidate the whole view.
      void removeAllCallbacks()
      Removes all Runnables from the message queue.
      void setTargetChild(FView view)
      Set root child for target

      • 从接口继承的方法 xfy.fakeview.library.fview.FViewParent

        getOldHeightMeasureSpec, getOldWidthMeasureSpec, invalidateChild, layoutChild, measureChildWithMargins, onSetLayoutParams, post, postDelayed, removeCallbacks, requestFViewTreeLayout, requestLayoutAll

    • 方法详细资料

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        Invalidate the whole view. If the view is visible, IFView.draw(Canvas) will be called at some point in the future.

        This must be called from a UI thread. To call from a non-UI thread, call

      • removeAllCallbacks

        void removeAllCallbacks()
        Removes all Runnables from the message queue.

      • setTargetChild

        void setTargetChild(FView view)
        Set root child for target
        参数:
        view - root child

      • getTargetChild

        FView getTargetChild()
        Get root child
        返回:

      • findFViewById

        FView findFViewById(int id)
        Finds the first descendant view with the given ID, the view itself if the ID matches IView.getId(), or null if the ID is invalid (< 0) or there is no matching view in the hierarchy.

        Note: In most cases -- depending on compiler support -- the resulting view is automatically cast to the target class type. If the target class type is unconstrained, an explicit cast may be necessary.

        参数:
        id - the ID to search for
        返回:
        a view with given ID if found, or null otherwise
